info.title: Azure Red Hat OpenShift
info.description: Rest API for Azure Red Hat OpenShift

get.summary: Lists all of the available RP operations.
get.description: Lists all of the available RP operations.  The operation returns the operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

get.summary: Lists OpenShift clusters in the specified subscription.
get.description: Lists OpenShift clusters in the specified subscription.  The operation returns properties of each OpenShift cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

get.summary: Lists OpenShift clusters in the specified subscription and resource group.
get.description: Lists OpenShift clusters in the specified subscription and resource group.  The operation returns properties of each OpenShift cluster.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

get.summary: Gets a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.
get.description: Gets a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.  The operation returns properties of a OpenShift cluster.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift cluster resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

put.summary: Creates or updates a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.
put.description: Creates or updates a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.  The operation returns properties of a OpenShift cluster.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift cluster resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

delete.summary: Deletes a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.
delete.description: Deletes a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.  The operation returns nothing.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift cluster resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

patch.summary: Creates or updates a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.
patch.description: Creates or updates a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.  The operation returns properties of a OpenShift cluster.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift cluster resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

post.summary: Gets credentials of a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.
post.description: Gets credentials of a OpenShift cluster with the specified subscription, resource group and resource name.  The operation returns the credentials.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: resourceName
parameters.description: The name of the OpenShift cluster resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.  If the resource doesn't exist, 404 (Not Found) is returned.  If any of the input parameters is wrong, 400 (Bad Request) is returned.

error.description: An error response from the service.

CloudErrorBody.description: CloudErrorBody represents the body of a cloud error.

code.description: An identifier for the error. Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

Display.description: Display represents the display details of an operation.

provider.description: Friendly name of the resource provider.

resource.description: Resource type on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Operation type: read, write, delete, listKeys/action, etc.

vmSize.description: The size of the master VMs (immutable).

subnetId.description: The Azure resource ID of the worker subnet (immutable).

podCidr.description: The CIDR used for OpenShift/Kubernetes Pods (immutable).

serviceCidr.description: The CIDR used for OpenShift/Kubernetes Services (immutable).

OpenShiftCluster.description: OpenShiftCluster represents an Azure Red Hat OpenShift cluster.

OpenShiftClusterCredentials.description: OpenShiftClusterCredentials represents an OpenShift cluster's credentials

kubeadminPassword.description: The password for the kubeadmin user

OpenShiftClusterList.description: OpenShiftClusterList represents a list of OpenShift clusters.

display.description: The object that describes the operation.

value.description: List of operations supported by the resource provider.

Properties.description: Properties represents an OpenShift cluster's properties.

apiserverUrl.description: The URL to access the cluster API server (immutable).

consoleUrl.description: The URL to access the cluster console (immutable).

ServicePrincipalProfile.description: ServicePrincipalProfile represents a service principal profile.

clientId.description: The client ID used for the cluster

clientSecret.description: The client secret used for the cluster

Tags.description: Tags represents an OpenShift cluster's tags.

name.description: The worker profile name.  Must be "worker" (immutable).

vmSize.description: The size of the worker VMs (immutable).

diskSizeGB.description: The disk size of the worker VMs.  Must be 128 or greater (immutable).

subnetId.description: The Azure resource ID of the worker subnet (immutable).

count.description: The number of worker VMs.  Must be between 3 and 20.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
